title: House Cleaning Fundamentals
headline: Discover the art of keeping your house clean with natural, safe homemade cleaning materials in this free online course.
description: House cleaning can be time-consuming and is probably not everyone's favourite activity. However, it is a part of our life and ignoring the cleaning chores will not make the mess go away. This course shows how setting up a cleaning routine and having the necessary tools can make house cleaning easier. In addition, you will explore recipes for natural cleansers and sanitisers that will keep your home clean, safe and germ-free.
courseDescription:
Everyone likes a spotlessly clean and fresh-smelling house. But, when you consider the size of your home or the number of your belongings, does it seem like a daunting task to keep everything neat, tidy and clean? Maintaining a house is not an easy job. However, daily tasks make cleaning more manageable and less daunting. Dividing the chores into daily, weekly, monthly and yearly habits can go a long way in keeping your home in order. In this course, we will teach you how to care for your home and make the cleaning routine quicker and easier. Do you pay attention to what chemicals you use to clean your house or worry about whether your cleaning products are safe for your children? Learn how to make your own cleaning products that are all-natural, safe and simple to use.

The first step to cleaning is to have the necessary equipment. Discover how to use different tools for various cleaning purposes, for example: cleaning your computer or removing dust from indoor plants. Study when and where to use the vacuum cleaner, the squeegee, the broom and cotton or microfibre dusters. Research how to remove dirt, dust, bacteria and mould from every type of surface of your kitchen and bathroom using natural cleaning products. Explore the various tricks and tips for cleaning the living room and bedrooms and recipes for natural cleansers and sanitising sprays made from ingredients in your pantry. Uncover the different uses of baking soda, borax, vinegar, natural essential oils and milk in cleaning your home.

Are you looking for safe ways to have a healthy home that doesn't spread germs and bugs? Have you been putting off cleaning for too long and now have to do a massive cleaning blitz? Our step-by-step guide to intelligent cleaning methods will help you clean every room in the house using homemade cleansers safely and effectively, and your home will be spotless in no time. Anyone can take this course to learn the tips and tricks that will make cleaning less bothersome. You will also have no reason to go out and buy harsh cleaning products full of harmful chemicals and allergens. If you're seeking natural home remedies to disinfect and clean, as well as ways to spend less time cleaning and saving money, this is the course for you. So why wait? Get started today and make your home a safer and cleaner place.
